[[Sauron]]'s plans bear fruit.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}} '''Where Is He?''' is the fourteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. Role |- | [[Peachy]] || [[Mr. Mouse]] |} == Trivia == Below is a list of trivia from Amazon's "X-Ray" feature that accompanied the episode. * Scene 2 - "Most of the details and elaborations told herein are derived from '[[The Lord of the Rings]]', its prologue entitled '[[Concerning Hobbits]]', and its [[Appendices]], [[Appendix A|A]] through [[Appendix F|F]], where the intrepid traveler may journey to discover even farther horizons." == Production == == Differences == == Reception == {{references}} {{rop-episodes}} {{title}} [[Category:The Rings of Power (TV series) episodes|14]]
